title: Reroll into perm skin. (How to make it better)
body:
Now on my hextech skins I have:

2x The magnificent twisted fate
1x Program Soraka
1x Dunkmaster Darius
1x Riot Graves
1x Tundra Fizz
1x Arcade Miss Forture



I only made Mf, Fizz and Graves skin perm but I do not want Program Soraka and The Magnificent Twisted Fate.

I heard that if you reroll 3 skins it is not guaranteed that it would be a better skin.


I feel like Riot should make it where if you reroll 3 skins that are either legendary or epic you get at least epic+

What do you guys think?
